sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row>
      <v-col v-for="(card, n) in cards" :key="n">
        <v-card class="pa-2" outlined tile> Column {{n}} </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>
<script>
export default {
  data: () => ({
    cards: [
      {
        id: 0,
        title: "eee",
        text: "",
        num: "",
      },
        {
        id: 1,
        title: "aaa",
        text: "",
        num: "",
      },
    ]
  }),
  created: async function () {
    console.log(this.currentTime());
  },
  methods: {
    currentTime() {
      let date = new Date();
      let hh = date.getHours();
      let mm = date.getMinutes();
      let ss = date.getSeconds();
      let session = "AM";

      if (hh === 0) {
        hh = 12;
      }
      if (hh > 12) {
        hh = hh - 12;
        session = "PM";
      }

      hh = hh < 10 ? "0" + hh : hh;
      mm = mm < 10 ? "0" + mm : mm;
      ss = ss < 10 ? "0" + ss : ss;

      let time = hh + ":" + mm + ":" + ss + " " + session;

      return time;
    },
  },
};
</script>
